title: Border Of A Chalice Cover, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin made continuous tape with bars added
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of a chalice cover with a pattern of floral scroll work connected by brides, with portes and point mignon.

tombstone.epitaph:
